title: America's Legal System - Coast to Coast AM - 7/4/19
itunes:title: America's Legal System - Coast to Coast AM - 7/4/19
description:
George Noory and Orange County California Judge Jim Gray discuss the country's legal system, whether drugs will be legalized, and what the future of law will be.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
